attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For far to long the Government have made taxs go up and up. And from what i can see there's no need for it. as they rise the taxs the line between the poor and rich will increase. so i ask the prime minister to either lower taxs or increase wages. If we wish for a better life than the people need to stand up for themselfs alone we are weak but together we are strong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
